Prologue

LOTTIE

“ Hey , [girl]2304-girl . ”[0-i] Hmm , [I]0-i do n’t like the cheeriness in [her]72-meghan voice . The smirk on [her]72-meghan lips . The overuse of [her]72-meghan toxic , throat - choking perfume . “ Hey , [Angela]73-angela , ”[0-i] [I]0-i answer with wary trepidation as [I]0-i take a seat at the table in [[her]72-meghan office]286-her office . With a flip of [her]72-meghan bright blonde hair over [her]72-meghan shoulder , [she]72-meghan clasps [her]72-meghan hands together , [her]72-meghan body language conveying interest as [she]72-meghan leans forward and asks , “ How are [you]0-i ? ”[72-meghan] [I]0-i smooth [my]0-i hands over [my]0-i bright red pencil skirt and answer , “ Doing fine . Thank [you]72-meghan . ”[72-meghan] “ That ’s so wonderful to hear . ”[72-meghan] [She]72-meghan leans back and smiles at [me]0-i , but does n’t say another word . Ohh - kay , what the hell is going on ? [I]0-i glance behind [me]0-i to [the row of suited men]287-the row of suited men , sitting upright in chairs , folders on [their]287-the row of suited men laps , staring at [our]288-we interaction . [I]0-i ’ve known [Angela]73-angela since middle school . [We]288-we ’ve had one of those on - again , off - again friendships , [me]0-i being [the victim of the intermittent camaraderie]289-the victim of the intermittent camaraderie . [I]0-i was [her]73-angela main squeeze one day , the next it was [Blair]74-blair — who works in finance , or [Lauren]75-lauren — who works over in sales , and then the friendship would come back to [me]0-i . [We]288-we ’re constantly interchangeable . Who ’s [the bestie]290-the bestie this week ? [I]0-i ’d always wonder , and in some sick , demented way , [I]0-i ’d have a hiccup of excitement when the bestie card landed on [me]0-i . Why stick around in such a toxic friendship , [you]291-you ask ? The answer is threefold . One — when [I]0-i first met [Angela]73-angela , [I]0-i was young . [I]0-i had no idea what the hell to do during such a vibrant roller coaster ride . [I]0-i just gripped the handles and held on for dear life , because frankly , hanging with [Angela]73-angela was exciting . Different . [Bold]76-bold , at times . Two — when [she]73-angela was nice to [me]0-i , when [we]288-we were deep into [our]288-we friendship , [I]0-i had some of the best times of [my]0-i life . Growing up in [Beverly Hills]1-beverly hills as [the poor girl]292-the poor girl did n’t lend [its]293-its hand to many adventures , but with [the rich friend who looked past [your]291-you empty wallet and welcomed [you]291-you into [her]73-angela world]294-the rich friend who looked past your empty wallet and welcomed you into her world — yeah , it was fun . Call [me]0-i shallow , but [I]0-i had fun in high school , despite the ups and downs . Three — [I’m]0-i weak . [I]0-i ’m confrontation ’s bitch and avoid it at all costs , therefore — raises hand — here [I]0-i am , [doormat]295-doormat , at [your]291-you service . “ [Angela]73-angela ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i whisper . “ Hmm ? ”[0-i] [She]73-angela smiles at [me]0-i . “ Can [I]73-angela ask why [you]0-i called [me]73-angela in here and why [the FBI]2305-the fbi seems to be lined up behind [me]73-angela ? ”[73-angela] [Angela]73-angela tilts [her]73-angela head back and lets out a hearty laugh as [her]73-angela hand lands on [mine]0-i . “ Oh , [Lottie]77-lottie . God , [I]73-angela ’m going to miss [your]0-i humor . ”[73-angela] “ [Miss]2306-miss ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i ask , [my]0-i spine stiffening . “ What do [you]0-i mean , [miss]2306-miss ? Are [you]0-i going on vacation ? ”[0-i] Please let that be the case . Please let that be the case . [I]0-i ca n’t afford to lose this job . “ [I]0-i am . ”[0-i] Oh , thank God . “ [Ken]78-ken and [I]0-i are headed to [Bora Bora]2-bora bora . [I]0-i have a spray tan scheduled in about ten minutes so [we]2308-we need to get on with this . ”[0-i] Wait , what ? “ Get on with what ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i ask . [Her]73-angela jovial face morphs into something serious , the type of serious [I]0-i do n’t see very often from [Angela]73-angela . [My]0-i eyes are too unfocused to even consider reading what it says , but taking a simple guess , [I]0-i ’m thinking it ’s a termination paper . “ Sign here . ”[303-the man] [The man]303-the man holds a pen out to [me]0-i . “ Wait , what ? ”[303-the man] [I]0-i move [the man]303-the man ’s hand away , only for it to bounce back right where it was . “ [You]303-the man ’re firing [me]73-angela ? ”[73-angela] [Angela]73-angela winces . “ [Lottie]77-lottie , please do n’t make this a thing . That ’s correct . ”[0-i] “ Well , per [your]73-angela contract , it says that after a year , [you]73-angela ’re no longer under restricted pay , but instead receive [your]73-angela actual salary . ”[73-angela] [She]73-angela shrugs . “ Why pay [you]73-angela more when [I]73-angela can find [someone]2314-someone to do [your]73-angela job for less ? Spray tans do n’t wait . ”[73-angela] [She]73-angela twirls [her]73-angela finger at [the guys beside [me]0-i]310-the guys beside me . “ Wrap it up , [boys]2312-boys . ”[73-angela] Two sets of hands grip [me]0-i and help [me]0-i up from [my]0-i chair . “ [You]73-angela ca n’t be serious , ”[0-i] [I]0-i say , still not quite grasping what ’s going on . “ [You]73-angela ’re having security drag [me]0-i out of [[your]73-angela office]2317-your office ? ”[0-i] “ Not by [my]73-angela choice , ”[73-angela] [Angela]73-angela says , the picture of innocence . “ [Your]73-angela hostile attitude is making [me]73-angela use security . ”[73-angela] “ Hostile ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i ask . “ [I]0-i ’m hostile because [you]73-angela ’re firing [me]0-i for no reason . ”[0-i] “ Oh , honey , [I]73-angela ca n’t believe [you]0-i see it that way , ”[73-angela] [she]73-angela says in that condescending voice of [hers]73-angela . “ This is nothing personal . How the hell did this all happen ?

Chapter One

[HUXLEY]82-huxley

“ [I]0-i ’m going to fucking murder [someone]2314-someone , ”[0-i] [I]0-i shout as [I]0-i throw [my]0-i suit jacket across [[my]0-i office]316-my office and slam [my]0-i door . “ Seems as though the meeting went well , ”[83-huxley] [JP]83-huxley says from where [he]83-huxley ’s leaning against the expansive wall of windows in [[my]0-i office]316-my office . “ Seems as though it went incredibly well , ”[84-breaker] [Breaker]84-breaker offers from where [he]84-breaker ’s lying across [my]0-i leather couch . Ignoring [[my]0-i brothers]319-my brothers ’ sarcasm , [I]0-i grip [my]0-i hair and turn toward the view of [Los Angeles]4-los angeles . It ’s a clear day today , fresh rain from the night before eliminating some of the smog in the air . Palm trees reach high to the sky , lining [the roads]320-the roads , but look small compared to where [[my]0-i office]316-my office sits above the rest . “ Care to gab about it ? ”[83-huxley] [JP]83-huxley asks while taking a seat in a chair . [I]0-i turn toward [them]319-my brothers , [[my]0-i brothers]319-my brothers , [the two idiots who have been by [my]0-i side]323-the two idiots who have been by my side through thick and thin . Who have ridden the ups and downs of [our]324-we lives . Who have dropped everything to join [me]0-i in this crazy idea of taking over [the real estate market in [Los Angeles]4-los angeles]325-the real estate market in los angeles with the money [Dad]85-dad left [us]324-we when [he]85-dad passed . [We]324-we ’ve built this empire together . But the smarmy looks on [their]319-my brothers faces makes [me]0-i want to punt [their]319-my brothers goddamn dicks out of [[my]0-i office]316-my office . “ Does it look like [I]319-my brothers want to gab about it ? ”[319-my brothers] “ No . ”[84-breaker] [Breaker]84-breaker smirks . “ But fuck do [we]324-we want to hear all about it . ”[84-breaker] Of course [they]319-my brothers do . Because [they]319-my brothers were the ones who said [I]0-i should n’t meet with [Dave Toney]86-dave . [They]319-my brothers were [the ones who said it was going to be a waste of]327-the ones who said it was going to be a waste of [my]0-i time . [They]319-my brothers were the ones who laughed when [I]0-i said [I]0-i had a meeting with [him]86-dave today . And [they]319-my brothers were the ones who sarcastically said good luck as [I]0-i walked out the door . But [I]0-i wanted to prove [them]319-my brothers wrong . [I]84-breaker really fucking hate [you]83-huxley . ”[84-breaker] [Breaker]84-breaker lets out a bark of a laugh while [JP]83-huxley says , “ Hate to say it , but . . . Chapter Seventeen

LOTTIE
